text: "Hey, Slavs" is a patriotic song made for the Slavs which was used as the national anthem of Yugoslavia and later of Serbia and Montenegro. Its tune is based off that of "Poland is Not Yet Lost", the national anthem of Poland. ==Lyrics== The song has been translated into all of the major Slavic languages. However, the song was most commonly sung in Yugoslavia. ===Slovak adaptation=== Slovak original English translation Hej, SlovÃ¡ci, eÅ¡te naÅ¡a slovenskÃ¡ reÄ Å¾ije, DokiaÄ¾ naÅ¡e vernÃ© srdce za nÃ¡Å¡ nÃ¡rod bije. Å½ije, Å¾ije, duch slovenskÃ½, bude Å¾iÅ¥ naveky, ğ„† Hrom a peklo, mÃ¡rne vaÅ¡e proti nÃ¡m sÃº vzteky! ğ„‡ Jazyka dar zveril nÃ¡m Boh, Boh nÃ¡Å¡ hromovlÃ¡dny, Nesmie nÃ¡m ho teda vyrvaÅ¥ na tom svete Å¾iadny; I nechÅ¾e je koÄ¾ko Ä¾udÃ­, toÄ¾ko Äertov v svete; ğ„† Boh je s nami: kto proti nÃ¡m, toho Parom zmetie. ğ„‡ A nechÅ¾e sa i nad nami hroznÃ¡ bÃºrka vznesie, Skala pukÃ¡, dub sa lÃ¡me a zem nech sa trasie; My stojÃ­me stÃ¡le pevne, ako mÃºry hradnÃ©. ğ„† ÄŒierna zem pohltÃ­ toho, kto odstÃºpi zradne! ğ„‡ Hey, Slovaks, there still lives the Slovak language As long as our faithful heart beats for our nation! There lives, lives, lives the Slovak spirit, it will live for ages! Thunder and Hell, in vain are your rages against us! God entrusted to us our language our thunderwielding god. Therefore, it must not be ripped from us, by anyone in the world! Let there be as many devils, as there are people in the world God is with us: who's against us, will by Perun be swept Even if a tremendous storm rises above us, The stone cracks, the oak breaks, and the earth quakes! We will stand always firm like the castle walls, To pits of the black earth be damned whom betrays treacherously! ===Yugoslav lyrics=== ===Serbo-Croatian=== Serbo-Croatian original (Latin) Serbo-Croatian original (Cyrillic) English translation Hej Slaveni, joÅ¡te Å¾ivi R[ij]eÄ (duh) naÅ¡ih d[j]edova Dok za narod srce bije Njihovih sinova Å½ivi, Å¾ivi duh slavenski Å½ivjet Ä‡e v[j]ekov'ma ğ„† Zalud pr[ij]eti ponor pakla Zalud vatra groma ğ„‡ Nek se sada i nad nama Burom sve raznese St[j]ena puca, dub se lama Zemlja nek se trese Mi stojimo postojano Kano klisurine ğ„† Proklet bio izdajica Svoje domovine! ğ„‡ Ğ¥ĞµÑ˜ Ğ¡Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ¸, Ñ˜Ğ¾ÑˆÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¸ Ğ ĞµÑ‡ (Ğ´ÑƒÑ…) Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñ… Ğ´ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° Ğ”Ğ¾Ğº Ğ·Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ ÑÑ€Ñ†Ğµ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ˜Ğµ ĞŠĞ¸Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ… ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° Ğ–Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¸, Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¸ Ğ´ÑƒÑ… ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ½ÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ–Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµÑ›Ğµ Ğ²ĞµĞºĞ¾Ğ²'Ğ¼Ğ° ğ„† Ğ—Ğ°Ğ»ÑƒĞ´ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¿Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ°, Ğ—Ğ°Ğ»ÑƒĞ´ Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ° Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ° ğ„‡ ĞĞµĞº' ÑĞµ ÑĞ°Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ‘ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑĞ²Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ½ĞµÑĞµ Ğ¡Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ¿ÑƒÑ†Ğ°, Ğ´ÑƒĞ± ÑĞµ Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°, Ğ—ĞµĞ¼Ñ™Ğ° Ğ½ĞµĞº' ÑĞµ Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑĞµ ĞœĞ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ˜Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ˜Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞšĞ°Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ, ğ„† ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ»ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ñ˜Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° Ğ¡Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ˜Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ! ğ„‡ Hey, Slavs, there still lives the word (spirit) of our grandfathers While for the nation beats the heart of its sons! There lives, there lives the Slavic spirit, It will live for ages! ğ„† In vain threatens the abyss of Hell In vain the fire of thunder! ğ„‡ Let now everything above us be blown away by the bora. The stone cracks, the oak breaks, Let the earth quake! We stand firm like the big cliffs, ğ„† May he be damned, the traitor of his homeland! ğ„‡ ====Macedonian==== Macedonian original Transliteration English translation Ğ•Ñ˜, Ğ¡Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ¸, Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ² Ğµ Ñ‚ÑƒĞºĞ° Ğ·Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚ ÑĞ²ĞµÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ‚ ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ ÑÑ€Ñ†Ğµ Ñ‡ÑƒĞºĞ° Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞºÑƒ ÑĞ¸Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ½ÑƒĞºĞ¾Ñ‚! Ğ–Ğ¸Ğ² Ğµ Ğ²ĞµÑ‡Ğ½Ğ¾, Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ² Ğµ Ğ´ÑƒÑ…Ğ¾Ñ‚ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ½ÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ²Ğ¾ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°. ğ„† ĞĞµ Ğ½Ñ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ°Ñ‚ Ğ°Ğ´ÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ±ĞµĞ·Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½! ğ„‡ ĞŸÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑˆĞµÑ˜ÑœĞ¸, Ğ½ĞµĞºĞ° Ğ±ÑƒÑ€Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ ÑĞµ Ğ²Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ğµ! ĞŸÑƒĞºĞ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ± Ğ¸ ĞºĞ°Ñ€Ğ¿Ğ° ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ°, Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑœĞµ ÑĞµ ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ğµ: Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµĞ½-Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ‚ \- ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ±ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ¼! ğ„† ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ»ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´Ğ° Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ˜ ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ°Ğ» Ğ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğ° Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ‚! ğ„‡ Ej, Sloveni, Å¾iv e tuka zborot svet na rodot Å¡tom za narod srce Äuka preku sin vo vnukot! Å½iv e veÄno, Å¾iv e duhot slovenski vo sloga. ğ„† Ne nÃ¨ plaÅ¡at adski bezdni nitu gromov ogan! ğ„‡ PustoÅ¡ejá¸±i, neka bura i nad nas se vturne! Puka dab i karpa sura, tloto á¸±e se urne: Stoime na stamen- pragot \- klisuri i bedem! ğ„† Proklet da e toj Å¡to predal Rodina na vragot! ğ„‡ Hey, Slavs, herein lives on the sacred word of our lineage as long as the heart beats for our nation from son to grandson! The Slavic spirit lives on forever in unity. ğ„† Infernal abysses do not frighten us, nor the blazes of thunder. ğ„‡ May a bora devastate and rage above us! Oak trees and ashen rocks will crack, the earth will cave in: For we stand at the doorstep of gorges and bulwarks! ğ„† Cursed is he who betrays his homeland to the enemy! ğ„‡ ====Slovenian==== Slovenian original English translation Hej Slovani, naÅ¡a reÄ slovanska Å¾ivo klije dokler naÅ¡e verno srce za naÅ¡ narod bije Å½ivi, Å¾ivi, duh slovanski, bodi Å¾iv na veke, ğ„† grom in peklo, prazne vaÅ¡e proti nam so steke ğ„‡ Naj tedaj nad nami straÅ¡na burja se le znese, skala poka, dob se lomi, zemlja naj se strese Bratje, mi stojimo trdno kakor zidi grada, ğ„† Ärna zemlja naj pogrezne tega, kdor odpada! ğ„‡ Hey, Slavs, our Slavic word sprouts alive, as long as our devout heart beats for our nation, Live, live, the Slavic spirit, be alive forever, thunder and hell, your stacks are empty against ours, Let above us then a terrible wind vent, rocks crack, oaks break, let the ground shake. Brothers, we're standing firmly like castle walls, let the black soil swallow those who fall off! ==References== Category:Historical anthems Category:European anthems Category:Yugoslavia
title: Hey, Slavs
